definition: surname Cheng/Cheng (c. 2000 BC), third of the legendary Flame Emperors 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
to bear/to carry/to hold/to continue/to undertake/to take charge/owing to/due to/to receive
at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)

sentences.english: The enterprise in undertakes in the social responsibility process to have blindness.
sentences.chinese: 企業在承當社會義務過程中具有自覺性。
是耶穌承當了所有“轉賬”的刑罰。

sentences.english: No one wants to take responsibility when things go wrong.
sentences.chinese: 沒有人想在事情出錯的時候來承當責任。

sentences.english: The marine insurance shall covered by us.
sentences.chinese: 海上保險的費用將由我方承當。

sentences.english: But I'm afraid my little kids are unready for that kind of responsibility yet.
sentences.chinese: 但生怕我的小孩還沒有打算好承當起那種義務。

sentences.english: People who act as catalysts and assume the responsibility for managing the change process.
sentences.chinese: 作爲催化劑起作用的並承當變革過程管理責任的人。

sentences.english: We have to assume the construction of homeland, prosperous homeland responsibility.
sentences.chinese: 咱們就要承當起建設故鄉，繁華故鄉的責任。
